summary: Full set of Elven armour and weapons, retextured with Quicksilver-coloured metal and bluish leather.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description:[/u][/b]
Full set of Elven armour and weapons, retextured with Quicksilver-coloured metal and bluish leather. I made this by request as an expansion of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55596/?]Karliah's Dagger[/url] mod. However, there is no dependency or conflicts between that mod and this one; both are completely standalone and compatible. The Quicksilver Elven set is functionally identical to the regular Elven set; all the perks and values are set up exactly the same. The only difference is that crafting and tempering recipes have been altered to reflect the heavy usage of Quicksilver.

All Quicksilver armour pieces display properly on males, females, and beast races. All world models, first person views, scabbards, etc. have been altered, so everything labeled Quicksilver will look like Quicksilver. All pieces have crafting and tempering recipes; each requires one Quicksilver ingot. There are two cuirasses: the regular one and the "light" version, which has a slightly lower armour rating and lacks the shoulder pauldrons.

If you would rather have this set replace the golden vanilla Elven set, I uploaded a replacer version under optional files. Do NOT use it alongside the Main version, or else you'll have two different Quicksilver sets. Simply extract the textures folder to your Skyrim Data folder; no esp required.

Big thanks to Callmegraham for making this showcase video:
[youtube]re5FMgeyApQ[/youtube]

[b][u]Updates:[/u][/b]
1.1--fixed an error in folder structure that was causing the armour textures to not work properly in the standalone version

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
Latest update and Dawnguard.

[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
--use NMM, or extract the QuicksilverElvenSet.esp and meshes and textures folders to your Skyrim Data folder
[b][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/b]
--use NMM, or delete QuicksilverElvenSet.esp and the meshes and textures folders named quicksilverelven

[b][u]Credits/Programs Used:[/u][/b]
--[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/247/?]BSAopt[/url]
--[url=http://www.gimp.org/]Gimp[/url]
--[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url]
--[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/740/?]Skyrim Retexturing Software Tutorial by David Brasher[/url]

[b][u]Permissions:[/u][/b]
If you want to incorporate my mod or its resources in a mod of your own, you may do so provided that you credit me for anything you use. I would also greatly appreciate it if you send me a link so I can check it out.

[b][u]Mods Used in Screenshots:[/u][/b]
--[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE - Vanilla by Caliente[/url]: greatly improves the look of Skyrim's women.

[b][u]My Other Mods:[/u][/b]

--[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53847/?]Fort Dawnguard No Cobwebs[/url]

--[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55060/?]Skaal Shack[/url]
author: GyntRyles
